page.title: 14 BIRTHDAY PARTIES.
page.content: An increasingly popular activity in 1985 is for junior{birthday parties}to be organised outside the home. Leisure Centres such as the one in{Cleethorpes now provide a very good service for parents who are trying to protect their homes from excited and sticky children. When the leisure centre organises the party, parents do not need to do any work and there are many activities to take part in. Swimming is the most popular activity which is usually followed by a meal in the restaurant. Parties are not always organised for the actual day of the childs birthday. For working parents Sundays are most popular between 2 and 4 o clock. Teenagers and adults can hire equipment in the centre which is becoming more popular together with the trend for keeping fit.
